attributes.action: Economic sanctions and international condemnation for the Burmese government in Myanmar
attributes.additional_details:
The west and the whole world should not keep quite while the Burmese government is conducting ethnic cleansing against the Rohingya minority. Innocent civilians are killed and tortured, women are being rapped, and houses burnt, this will have to stop now.
Maximum punishment should be implemented against the Burmese government for falling to protect its own people.
